comment: If the caravan reaches US border & most of crowd (10,000 at last count) gets thru, it will be only the beginning. More will come after it - millions in toto. Pacific hurricane is cutting through an area they will likely be passing after the hurricane, or the hurricane may turn directly into the caravan.

      :op2 (p3 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (t2 / turn-02
